mapper.insert: insert into t_sys_hot_goods ( hot_goods_code, goods_code, hot_goods_sort_num, is_delete, create_user, create_time, last_update_user, last_update_time, version ) values ( #{hotGoodsCode}, #{goodsCode}, #{hotGoodsSortNum}, #{isDelete}, #{createUser}, now(), #{lastUpdateUser}, now(), 0 )
mapper.select: select a.hot_goods_sort_num as hotGoodsSortNum, a.goods_code as goodsCode, b.goods_name as goodsName, a.hot_goods_code as hotGoodsCode, a.version as version from t_sys_hot_goods a, t_sys_goods b where a.hot_goods_code = #{hotGoodsCode} and a.goods_code = b.goods_code

select a.hot_goods_sort_num as hotGoodsSortNum, a.goods_code as goodsCode, b.goods_price as goodsPrice, b.goods_introduce as goodsIntroduce, a.hot_goods_code as hotGoodsCode, a.version as version from t_sys_hot_goods a, t_sys_goods b where a.is_delete = 0
and goods_name like concat('%', #{goodsName}, '%')
and goods_code like concat('%', #{goodsCode}, '%')
and a.goods_code = b.goods_code order by a.create_time
mapper.update: update t_sys_hot_goods set hot_goods_sort_num = #{hotGoodsSortNum}, goods_code = #{goodsCode}, version = version + 1, last_update_user = #{lastUpdateUser}, last_update_time = now() where hot_goods_code = #{hotGoodsCode} and version = #{version}
mapper.select: select dictionary_setting as hotGoodsShowNum, version as verison from t_sys_dictionary where dictionary_code = 123456789 and is_delete = 0
mapper.update: update t_sys_dictionary set dictionary_setting = #{hotGoodsShowNum}, version = version + 1, last_update_user = #{lastUpdateUser}, last_update_time = now() where is_delete = 0 and version = #{version} and dictionary_code = 123456789
